elements.title: Adoration of the Magi in the Snow
elements.contents: ... that the Adoration of the Magi in the Snow (pictured), recently re-dated, is now known to be the earliest of Bruegel's snow paintings?

elements.title: the Philly Specials
elements.contents: ... that the Philly Specials, formed by three football players from the Philadelphia Eagles, have recorded Christmas music with Stevie Nicks and Boyz II Men?

elements.title: Dickinson pumpkin
elements.contents: ... that heavy spring rains caused a poor harvest of the Dickinson pumpkin, leading to a canned pumpkin shortage for Christmas in 2015?

elements.title: Holiday Seasoning
elements.contents: ... that Holiday Seasoning was promoted with the release of holiday seasonings?

elements.title: HMT Night Hawk
elements.contents: ... that HMT Night Hawk was sunk on Christmas Day 1914 while trawling for mines off Scarborough, England?

elements.title: National Gingerbread House Competition
elements.contents: ... that the National Gingerbread House Competition, despite its name, has featured gingerbread merry-go-rounds, sea monsters, and even the Statue of Liberty?

elements.title: Pflaumentoffel
elements.contents: ... that Pflaumentoffel, edible figures made from prunes, were sold by children in German Christmas markets in the 19th century?

elements.title: The Christmas Invasion
elements.contents: ... that "The Christmas Invasion" led to Christmas specials becoming a staple for Doctor Who?

elements.title: A. krampus
elements.contents: ... that A. krampus has been found living in southeastern Brazil?
